name: Surreptitious Spellcaster
summary: You’ve learned that it pays for a Pathfinder to be able to cast spells without being noticed.
description:
You’ve learned that it pays for a Pathfinder to be able to cast spells without being noticed. You gain the Conceal Spell wizard class feat, though it’s not a wizard feat for you. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to Conceal a Spell and to Deception checks to conceal verbal components.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
